message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $200. I believe it offers great value considering its quality and the benefits it provides. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making an offer.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a budget and need to be mindful of the price.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budgetary considerations. After careful thought, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $150. This reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while still ensuring fair compensation for our product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations. Let me know if you'd like to discuss further or if you have any other questions.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $150 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $130, but I'm hoping we can meet in the middle. Can you consider a price of $140?
